title: Yasuo new skins plz Rito!!!
body: I know a lot of champs have more than one skin, except Kindred. cuz its new. but YASUO has only 2 skins. no rare skins or event skins ei( lcs teams or chrismas or halloween skins) yasuo has been out since season 3, yet riven has like 5 or so. i also know Zed has 2 skins, but he has SKT zed. a special skin, so rito gods, i believe it would be am amazing thing if 'The Unforgiven' finally go another skin. P.S. (Riven's model seriously needs an update just saying. Looks garbage and puts me off some times, no offence){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} By {{champion:157}}  The one and only wind user. (and riven's ult wave)

replies.body:
no he doesn't.
more skins = more people playing him.
can you see the problem there?
the problem i see is me, being a good yas, getting fed of of the noob yas. No challenge! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
m9 do u even know azir? He only has his release skin
We need another Teemo skin as much as we need another Yasuo skin...
i see you started playing AFTER his project skin release......smh.....
Many other champs need a new skins be yas. He had a skin come out less than a year ago...
only problem there is that it sucks. Its animations are slightly delayed, he is clunky compared to other skins and it was a "test" for the actual project skins, which are actually good

New Yorick skin, New Taric skin, New Azir skin, New Bard skin, New Diana skin, New Elise skin (Maybe SKT soon?), New Braum skin, New Corki skin, New Galio skin, New Jayce skin, New Maokai skin, New Rumble Skin (Maybe SKT?), New Urgot skin first, then we can think about a Yasuo one.
Maybe even a Taric, Poppy and Yorick rework before any new skins? :)
Diana needs a new skin. She's older than Yas yet she only has 2.
